plot: Aang begins to learn earthbending from Toph; Uncle Iroh resumes teaching Zuko firebending to better prepare him for facing Azula, and reveals a new technique he learned from watching waterbenders.

Aang is finally excited to learn earth bending from Toph, but he begins to have a difficult time with the art. Sokka goes hunting, but he gets stuck in a fissure, after he tries to hunt a baby saber-tooth moose lion. Meanwhile, Zuko has been nursing his uncle back to health after he was injured by Azula. Iroh tries to teach Zuko how to redirect lighting by using a special technique he learned from water benders. Zuko begins to have a difficult time on trying to create or redirect lighting.—dawsonpersi
